quest.name: Troubled Waters
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Something goes bump in Greatest Endsvale, and it has Mopingway concerned.

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh dear... Oh my, oh dear, this is terrible!

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank goodness you're here! There's a strange sound coming from the waterway. I think there might be something wrong with the water regulation system.

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: What if the water starts to flow backwards? Or worse! Everything must be inspected from top to bottom, but time is of the essence, and I can't possibly hope to do it all on my own... Not as quickly as I'd like, at any rate. Please say you will help.

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, thank goodness. Look for the water towers to the north and you'll find the regulators.

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: If you can take care of that, I will see to the rest. We can reconvene here when you've finished.

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Inspect the water towers to the north and I will see to the rest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You hear nothing out of the ordinary.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You hear an odd bubbling murmur. This machine seems to be malfunctioning.

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: How did everything look on your side?

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: A murmur by the northeast regulator? Hmmm... I think I know what the problem is.

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: We released fish into the river so that our guests could go fishing, but they're likely attracted to the heat of the regulators.

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Not to worry! This is but one little bump on the road to building a fantastic recreational facility, and thanks to you, the path forward can be made smoother.

dialogue.name: MOPINGWAY
dialogue.text: When our work is finished, I hope you'll visit again and make the most of what we have to offer.
